page.title: 09THE LOCAL VICAR
page.content: Our vicars name is Mr Beer.Mr Beer looks after 3 churches.They are Hardwick,Caldecote and Toft.The first service is at Hardwick church at 8.00 then he goes to Caldecote and Toft.At 11.00 he has got to go round and visit people.He stays and talks to the people for half an hour or less and he tries to comfort them if they have lost anybody and sometimes if people ask him he will pray for them or with them. On Sunday Mr Beer is the busiest person in the village . He used to go to university to teach students. Mr.Beer comes to school on Thursday to talk to the children and take assembly for the school.Mr Beer lives in the new Rectory which is behind the church.
